short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage 'Other bookmarks' folder in a New Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kartotek is a Chrome Extension for managing the 'Other bookmarks' folder.

â–ªï¸ Manage bookmarks and folders from 'Other bookmarks' in a new tab with a drag-and-drop interface
â–ªï¸ Hide unnecessary bookmarks folders without deleting them from Chrome
â–ªï¸ Customize a new tab design (color theme, font size and family, column count and width)
â–ªï¸ Add, edit, delete, and move bookmarks and folders
â—ï¸Be careful! All changes fully sync with Chrome. But... The app syncs fully with Chrome only when a New Tab is opened... ğŸ™ƒ
